translation.your_buddy_closed_the_private_connection: Your contact closed the private connection.
translation.you_have_only_a_subscription_in_one_way: You only have a one-way subscription.
translation.your_message_wasnt_send_please_end_your_: Your message was not sent. Please end your private conversation.
translation.your_buddy_closed_the_private_conversati: Your contact closed the private conversation! You should do the same.
translation.Creating_your_private_key_: Creating your private key; this may take a while.
translation.Authenticating_a_buddy_helps_: Authenticating a contact helps ensure that the person you are talking to is really the one they claim to be.
translation.How_do_you_want_to_authenticate_your_bud: How do you want to authenticate __bid_name__ (__bid_jid__)?
translation.Question: Question
translation.To_verify_the_fingerprint_: To verify the fingerprint, communicate with your contact via some trustworthy channel, such as the telephone.
translation.To_authenticate_using_a_question_: To authenticate using a question, pick a question whose answer is known only to you and your contact.
translation.To_authenticate_pick_a_secret_: To authenticate, pick a secret known only to you and your contact.
translation.Type_in_the_full_username_: Type in the full username and an optional alias.
translation.You_are_about_to_remove_: You are about to remove __bid_name__ (__bid_jid__) from your contact list. All related chats will be closed.
translation.Sorry_we_cant_authentikate_: Authentication failed with the chat server. Maybe the password is wrong?
translation.Should_we_notify_you_: Should we notify you about new messages in the future?
translation.Please_accept_: Please click the "Allow" button at the top.
translation.Not_one_of_our_latest_keys: Not one of our latest keys.
translation.TITLE: Job title
translation.A_fingerprint_: A fingerprint is used to make sure that the person you are talking to actually is who they are claiming to be.
translation.Sorry_your_buddy_doesnt_provide_any_info: Sorry, your contact does not provide any information.
translation.Please_allow_access_to_microphone_and_ca: Please click the "Allow" button at the top, to allow access to microphone and camera.
translation.Do_you_want_to_accept_the_call_from: Do you want to accept the call from
translation.Video_call_not_possible: Video call not possible. Your contact does not support video calls.

muc_hidden.description: can not be found through search

muc_membersonly.description: you need to be on the member list

muc_moderated.description: only persons with "voice" are allowed to send messages

muc_nonanonymous.description: your Jabber ID (chat address) is exposed to all other occupants

muc_passwordprotected.description: you need to provide the correct password

muc_persistent.description: will not be destroyed when the last occupant leaves

muc_semianonymous.description: your Jabber ID (chat address) is only exposed to room admins

muc_temporary.description: will be destroyed if the last occupant left

muc_unmoderated.description: everyone is allowed to send messages

muc_unsecured.description: no password is required to enter

translation.Could_load_only: Could load only __count__ rooms for autocomplete
translation.muc_explanation: Please enter room name and optionally a nickname to join a chat
translation.Room_not_found_: A new room will be created
translation.muc_removed_kicked: You have been kicked from the room
translation.muc_removed_info_kicked: __nickname__ has been kicked from the room
translation.muc_removed_banned: You have been banned from the room
translation.muc_removed_info_banned: __nickname__ has been banned from the room
translation.muc_removed_affiliation: You have been removed from the room, because of an affiliation change
translation.muc_removed_info_affiliation: __nickname__ has been removed from the room, because of an affiliation change
translation.muc_removed_membersonly: You have been removed from the room, because the room has been changed to members-only and you are no member
translation.muc_removed_info_membersonly: __nickname__ has been removed from the room, because the room has been changed to members-only and you are no member
translation.muc_removed_shutdown: You have been removed from the room, because the MUC service is being shut down
translation.message_not_send: Your message was not sent because of an unspecified error
translation.message_not_send_item-not-found: Your message was not sent because this room does not exist
translation.message_not_send_forbidden: Your message was not sent because you have no voice in this room
translation.message_not_send_not-acceptable: Your message was not sent because you are no occupant of this room
translation.message_not_send_resource-unavailable: Your message was not sent because your interlocutor isn't available or connected
translation.message_not_send_remote-server-not-found: Your message was not sent because the server-to-server connection failed
translation.You_are_not_on_the_member_list: You are not on the member list
translation.You_are_banned_from_this_room: You have been banned from this room
translation.Your_desired_nickname_: Your desired nickname is already in use. Please choose another one
translation.The_maximum_number_: The maximum number of users in this room has been reached
translation.You_are_not_allowed_to_create_: You are not allowed to create a room
translation.PermissionDeniedError: You or your browser denied media permission
translation.You_received_a_message_from_an_unknown_s: You received a message from an unknown sender (__sender__). Do you want to display it?
translation.Your_roster_is_empty_add_: Your roster is empty, add a new contact
translation.onsmp_explanation_question: Your contact is attempting to determine if they are really talking to you. To authenticate to your contact, enter the answer and click "Answer".
translation.onsmp_explanation_secret: Your contact is attempting to determine if they are really talking to you. To authenticate to your contact, enter the secret.
translation.Do_you_want_to_change_the_default_room_c: Would you like to change the default room configuration?
translation.setting-explanation-carbon: With carbon copies enabled, for every message addressed to you, your XMPP server will send a copy of it to this client, even if this client was not explicitely listed as a recipient.
translation.setting-explanation-login: If this option is enabled, the chat will start on login.
translation.setting-explanation-priority: If you are logged in multiple times with the same account on different clients, your XMPP server will deliver messages to the client with the highest priority. We suggest newcomers should set all values on all clients to 0 to minimize confusion.
translation.setting-explanation-xmpp: These options are used to connect to the XMPP server.
translation.setting-explanation-chat-state: Do you want to send and receive information when someone starts/stops composing a message?
translation.HTTPS_REQUIRED: This action requires an encrypted connection.
translation.Install_extension: Please install the extension in order to use screen sharing:
translation.setting-mam-enable: Do you want to be able to retrieve stored older messages from the server?
translation.No_proper_file_transfer_method_available: No proper file transfer method available
translation.You_have_to_go_online_: You have to be online to execute this operation.
translation.After_changing_this_option_you_have_to_r: After changing this option, you have to reload the page
translation.muc_invite_explanation: Enter username or Jabber ID of the contact you like to invite.
translation.omemo-device-list-explanation: With OMEMO you can send an encrypted message to all OMEMO capable devices of you and your contact. To ensure that those devices really belong to you or your contact, you should compare their key IDs over another communication channel. If you don't want to compare those IDs, just click "Recognize", but please be aware that in this case someone could read along.
translation.You_received_an_OMEMO_encrypted_message: You received an OMEMO encrypted message
translation.Your_contact_does_not_support_OMEMO: Your contact does not support OMEMO
translation.There_are_new_devices_for_your_contact: There are new devices for your contact
translation.You_ignore_all_devices_of_your_contact: You ignore all devices of your contact
translation.I_found_new_devices_from_you: I found new devices from you
translation.Message_received_from_unknown_OMEMO_devi: Message received from unknown OMEMO device
translation.omemo-clean-up-explanation: If you clean up your own devices, all devices will be removed from your device list. Next time you use your other devices they will added to the list again. Therefore only your active devices will be on the list and used by your contacts to encrypt messages.
translation.Blindly_trusted_all_your_own_devices_on_: Blindly trusted all your own devices on first use
translation.Blindly_trusted_peer_on_first_use: Blindly trusted peer on first use
translation.setting-bookmarks-enable: If you like to store your group chats in your contact list, let it enabled.
translation.setting-http-upload-enable: Allows to send files to group chats and enables your contact to receive a transferred file on all his devices.
translation.setting-meCommand-enable: Replaces /me at the beginning of a message with the display name of that contact.
translation.setting-omemo-enable: OMEMO is the modern way to send end-to-end encrypted messages between contacts. It supports message synchronization between multiple devices.
translation.setting-otr-enable: Off-the-Record Messaging (OTR) enables you to send end-to-end encrypted messages from one device to another.
translation.setting-receipts-enable: Enable this plugin if you like to use delivery receipts. If your contact supports this too, both of you will see if a message arrived.
translation.setting-vcard-avatar-enable: Use vCard to get nice and shiny avatars from your contacts.
translation.chatmarkers-description: Do you want to see when your contact has received or read your messages?
